name: MeasurementScale
shortdesc: The measurement scale for the document.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: pixelLength
property.shortdesc: The length (in pixels) to which this scale equates.

property.name: logicalLength
property.shortdesc: The logical length this scale equates to.

property.name: logicalUnits
property.shortdesc: The logical units for this scale.
